text: I am working on creating some new email templates for our organization. I was going to build everything through the design manager and build out different modules for the different section, but then I noticed the drag-and-drop templates. Is it possible to build a drag-and-drop template with locked down headers and footers?
Do you mean drag and drop with a full custom built template?

We have the design, but the middle sections change from template to template. If I could just build the headers and footers then build out a template with these sections but allow the user to add in another rich text module if needed, that would be ideal
Can you use the dnd_area tags in email?
No the dnd_area feature is still in beta, I wouldn’t recommend it unless they’ve made bigger strides in letting you use the email structure you want.

No worries! Can I point you to my article on how I build a form of d&d in HubSpot -

<https://emailancer.com/blog/build-a-user-arrangeable-email-using-custom-html-modules-in-HubSpot>
If you wanted to lock it down then just create your coded template with hardcoded modules (but still content editable if needed) then let them choose the modules that you want them to between them.
Thanks that gives me something to try out
And they force a specific email structure which makes it incompatible with how I code emails.
